document_data.name: Dogwood
document_data.mainbody: '''Dogwood''' was a variety of tree found in the Realms.
document_data.Habitats:
* In [[Faer√ªn]], these trees could be found in the high elevated areas of the [[Yuirwood]].
* In [[Kara-Tur]], these trees could be found in the [[Maeshi Province]] of [[Kozakura]]
document_data.Trivia: Dried flowers from a dogwood were used in the making of the ''[[Edu'sascar]]''.
